Changing the minumum wage to a livable wage in Los Angeles

for Raise the Wage

Raising and enforcing the wage to $15 will transform the LA region, create jobs, and lift hundreds of thousands out of poverty.

Role
Creative Direction, Website Design, Branding
Team
Cottleston Pie, Patronage, Swell
Live Site
laraisethewage.org

On a mission to bring a livable wage to Los Angeles, Raise the Wage works on the ground with community activists to push for the minimum wage to be raised to $15.

Cottleston Pie collaborated with Swell and Patronage to bring their campaign strategy to life. We created the branding for the campaign and translated that brand into the website design.

Cottleston Pie is led by Dave Dawson

Learn about the studio

Based out of The Works in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn
